interpretation:
The up-right arrow is a symbol of progress and momentum, representing forward motion and positive change. This card suggests that you are moving in the right direction, and that your efforts are paying off. Keep pushing forward with confidence and determination, and you will achieve your goals.

This card may also indicate a need to take action and make progress in a particular area of your life. Don't be afraid to take risks and try new things, as long as you stay focused on your goals. Trust in your instincts and move forward with purpose, and you will find success.

When this card appears in a reading, it is a reminder to stay motivated and keep moving forward, even when faced with obstacles or setbacks. With the up-right arrow on your side, you have the power to overcome any challenges and achieve your dreams.
